mapper.select: SELECT A.ID_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PASSWORD , A.TEMP_PWD_YN , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.HIRE_DATE , A.ACC_SECESSION_DATETIME , A.ACC_SECESSION_YN , B.ID_NO , B.AUTHORITY_NO , C.AUTHORITY_NO , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESCRIPTION , D.SALARY_STEP_BY_RANK FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_AUTH B ON (A.ID_NO = B.ID_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTH C ON (B.AUTHORITY_NO = C.AUTHORITY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_SALARY_STEP D ON(A.ID_NO = D.ID_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
SELECT COMPANY_NO FROM TBL_MEMBER_COMPANY WHERE ID_NO = #{ no }
